title: Error when starting up thunderbird
content:
I get this error when I start up Thunderbird on my Desktop PC but not on my Laptop.

Mozilla Thunderbird ESR

Thunderbird The current operation on 'INBOX' did not succeed. The mail server for account sotackd@gmail.com responded: [NONEXISTENT] Unknown

However once this is cleared my Gmail and Thunderbird work perfectly.

Please see attached info.

HELP please.

title: Thunderbird emails disapear
content: Within the last couple of days, while using Thunderbird, my list of unread emails disappears and I get a box that pops up that says: "The folder 'inbox on johnking2@comcast.net' could not be compacted because writing to folder failed. Verify that you have enough disc space, and that you have write privileges to the file system, then try again." If I click OK, my list of emails returns for a short while. I have no idea what to do, as nothing has changed, that I am aware of. I have a SD hard drive with about 17% space available. This is on a Dell laptop with i7 processor. Please help!

title: cancellazione email
content: Buongiorno, il problema è il seguente: Nonostante nelle opzioni "politiche di conservazione" della cartella posta in arrivo risulti flaggata la cancellazione delle email più vecchie di "3 giorni" in realtà non le cancella, lo fa regolarmente in quella "spam" e "inviate" . Ho provato a cancellare e reimpostare l'account e reimpostargli nuovamente tutti i parametri ma nulla da fare. Il suddetto problema, lo fa, a onor del vero, da circa 6 - 7 mesi. prima no. la versione di Thunderbird è la 139.0.2 (64bit) scaricata direttamente dal sito ufficiale e aggiornata regolarmente. Grazie e Buona giornata
creator: ramesseii

title: Card Scanner that's usable with Thunderbird

I really need to free up some real estate on my desk, and getting rid of stacks of business cards would solve most of that problem.

title: Thunderbird Document (.eml) in local network
content:
Hello, For some time now (maybe since the last update), I haven't been able to open an eml file saved on another disk in the local network. These are important messages saved by various network users. I can open these documents with another email program. 

My actions: I added the Thunderbird program to the Windows firewall exceptions. I turned off the firewall. I disabled the antivirus program. I uninstalled the program and reinstalled it. Nothing worked.  A colleague can open these files, but she has version 128.11.1esr - which I cannot install without creating a new profile. At the moment I have 4 profiles, so it would be problematic, especially since I don't know for how long it would help.

Please help. Best regards. Nina tel. +48604630860, ksiegowosc@cdpartner.pl

PS. I have two e-mail accounts with long history of messeging. Last summer the Thunderbird started to hang. I divided my 1 profile into 4 - two active and two archives. Now they are working.
creator: KSIEGOWOSC9

title: Display name in Thunderbird Message List Pane
content:
I am running Thunderbird 139.0.2 (64-bit). I have two address books. In Tools > Settings > General > Message List the box beside Show only display name for people in my address book is checked. Nonetheless, the Message List Pane displays several Contacts in my Address Book with both full name and email address.

If I right click on the name and email address in the Message Preview Pane and click Add to address book the name and e-mail address do not revert to Display Name only. If I right click them again there is still the Add to address book option, with no Edit Contact option, as if the Contact had not yet been added.

In some cases after adding the Contact to the address book there is only the Display Name in the Message List Pane but this display name is neither of my address books.
creator: groucho3

title: Thunderbird not responding
content:
I have been runnign Thunderbird for a number of years. Several days ago when I started the app it said it was compacting the Gmail ALL Messages folder. It would never finish. So I downloaded the 139 version of Thunderbird, and installed it. When I try and start it I get a message at the bottom that says tomdyer72@gmail.com: looking up imap.gmail.com. It never comes off of that. After a few minutes, or if I click anywhere else in Thunderbird, I get the "Home - Mozilla Thunderbird (Not responding) at the top of the screen, and it will time out with the cnacle, or continue waiting message.

I have tried uninstalling all versions, and re-downloading the 139, and it still does the same thing. How can I recover this without losing all of my stored emails>
creator: tomdyer72

title: Inbox toegankelijkheid
content: Ik gebruik Thunderbird 128.11.1esr (64bits) onder W11 Home versie 24H2 build 26100.4349. Ik heb drie email accounts in gesteld. De twee daarvan doen het nog als vanouds. De derde kan sinds gisteren (24 juni 2025) de ontvangen email niet meer kwijt in de Inbox. Na de melding van zoveel berichten ontvangen verschijnt er een pop-up waarin zoveel staat als "onvoldoende opslagruimte of geen toegangsrechten". Zie bijgevoegd screenshot. Er is geen sprake van te weinig geheugen of een enorme inbox. Heb voor de zekerheid drastisch opgeschoond maar dat hielp niet. Het probleem is zomaar midden op de dag ontstaan zonder voor mij duidelijke aanleiding. Ik heb geprobeerd om iets te doen aan toegangsrechten maar daar kom ik niet uit. Boven dien hebben de twee andere accounts geen probleem.
creator: leo2

title: Unsaved email addresses turning up in autocomplete
content:
This question is now over 10 years old: In the auto-complete of e-mail addresses, old invalid addresses keep appearing in this list that are not in any address book (any more). How can I delete one from the list, or perhaps all?

It's not mine, and I'm pretty sure the bug is far older than this. You send one email to a person and afterwards their email keeps popping up in suggestions even though you didn't save it in collected addresses.

The only solution offered is an extremely clunky, labour-intensive workaround. It's not the users' fault. When is this absolutely-not-a-feature getting the attention it deserves? The option Collected addresses should not work if it's not selected.

Yours in annoyance on a hot and sticky day.
creator: unrealjayhumphrey
